name: Duergar Screamer
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Engine of Pain
traits.desc: Once per turn, a creature that attacks the screamer can target the duergar trapped in it. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) damage to the screamer, and the screamer can respond by using its Multiattack with its reaction.
